page.title: 13HOUSING IN BURNHAM MARKET 2
page.content:
{Private Housing}
Burnham market is a very popular holiday village, and twelve of the privately owned houses and cottages in this survey area are holiday homes. Many of the other private dwellings are owned by people who have moved to this area to retire. Although few of the houses in this survey area date from before the last war, the use of traditional building materials is encouraged. Several small housing estates have been built in the vilage in the past decade, and it is in the part of Burnham Market covered by this survey that most new building is taking place. Kestrel Close, the most recent development, consists of 24 bungalows constructed in a mixture of traditional flint and brick.
